page.title: 16Ffynnon Gynydd School.
page.content: Our School is 107 years old.Originally it was known as Ffynnon Cynidr Parochial School.It had 1 classroom and one porch.In 1895 another classroom was added.There were 96 pupils on roll and 3 teachers. Today,we have 28 pupils,2 teachers,1 cook,1 caretaker and 1 mid-day super- visor.A peripatetic violin teacher and Welsh teacher visits us once a week. The old School House has recently been converted into a School Kitchen and a Library. We are like one big happy family.We work hard but do lots of interesting things too.We play other schools at soccer,netball,cricket and rounders. We do Movement and Drama,Science and Music.We entertain the old folk at Christmas.We go for a weekend to Pemb- roke every Summer.We have Sportsdays, Opendays,Fetes & Educational visits.
